description: Vice-principal of the Seito Sannomiya Private School. She works closely with Sannomiya Chieko, and like her, is a stern misandric; resulting from a failed marriage. Mukogawa grows the most suspicious of Hibiki early into his career and tries debunking his identity several times. She has one child who is never mentioned to both the staff or students of the institution.
name: Mukogawa Reiko
